Text: Neethikku Thandanai (Tamil: நீதிக்கு தண்டனை / English : Punishment for Law) is a 1987 Indian Tamil film, directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar and produced by S. S. Neelakantan and Shoba Chandrasekhar.
